text: The Silver Greyhound is a 1919 British silent film directed by Bannister Merwin and starring James Knight, Marjorie Villis and Mary Dibley.Low p.300 ==Cast== * James Knight as John Vane * Marjorie Villis as Nancy Lisle * Mary Dibley as Lady Chalmore * Frank Petley as The Master * Jeff Barlow * Clifford Pembroke * Charles Ashley as Lord Chalmore * Dallas Cairns * Hamilton Stewart * Frank Gerrard ==References== ==Bibliography== * Low, Rachael. The History of British Film The History of the British Film 1914 - 1918. Routledge, 2013. ==External links== * Category:1919 films Category:English-language films Category:British films Category:British silent feature films Category:Films directed by Bannister Merwin Category:Films set in England Category:British black-and-white films
title: The Silver Greyhound (1919 film)
